mapper.delete: delete from feedscrap where user_idx = #{userIdx} and feed_idx = #{feedIdx};
mapper.select: select s.feed_idx, f.user_idx, u.nickname, f.update_date, f.file_idx, ifnull((select count(*) from feedcomment where s.feed_idx = feed_idx and is_deleted = 0), 0) as comment_count, ifnull((select count(*) from feedlike where s.feed_idx = feed_idx), 0) as like_total_count from feedscrap s join mainfeed f on s.feed_idx = f.feed_idx join mainuser u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx where s.user_idx = #{userIdx} and f.is_public = 1 and f.is_deleted = 0;
